pr_title: Only create deployment directory for new deployments

timeline.message: Only create deployment directory for new deployments

timeline.bodyText: why is this only for regular deployments? Why isn't this used for kernel updates too?
timeline.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: kernel updates also start from DEFAULT stage. Non DEFAULT value means continuing with kernel update after restart https://github.com/aws/aws-greengrass-nucleus/blob/master/src/main/java/com/aws/greengrass/deployment/DeploymentTaskFlowChart.svg
replies.author: hui-yang
